analysis.description:
Crowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/24/0xa07f66bee650f6260fa79130c71901e0f00b863c.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/24/0xa07f66bee650f6260fa79130c71901e0f00b863c.sol)

Token.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xa07f66bee650f6260fa79130c71901e0f00b863c.sol#549)
